section.title: PlaceAgain
section.para:
Causes the current window's position to be re-computed using the initial window placement logic. The window is moved to where it would have been if it were a new window that had just appeared. Most useful with Smart or Clever (ReallySmart) placement. With the optional argument
an animated move is used to place the window in its new position. With the additional option , the icon is placed again instead.
